title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SUI Drops 5.1% as Index Trades Lower From Thursday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Filecoin (FIL) was also an underperformer, declining 3.3%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2642.5, down 1.0% (-27.91) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Five of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: DOT (+2.1%) and AAVE (+1.6%).

Laggards: SUI (-5.1%) and FIL (-3.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is trading down 1.0% with more assets declining than rising, led by significant drops in SUI (-5.1%) and FIL (-3.3%).
